description: A foreign key to a provider in the provider table.
A foreign key to a standard provider's specialty concept identifier in the Vocabulary. This is a madatory field.
A foreign key to a concept that refers to the code used in the source
The source code for the provider specialty as it appears in the source data, stored here for reference.

This is an optional field. In the case that a provider has multiple specialties and thus multiple records in this table, specialties can be ranked in this field numerically (primary specialty = 1, secondary specialty = 2, etc.).
